Paragraph: In contrast , the series resistance at PCZDTB and PC71BM ratio of 1 : 1 and 1 : 4 was 320 , 62 Ω / cm^2 , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| series resistance at PCZDTB |
| series resistance at PC71BM |
| ratio of PCZDTB and PC71BM (for PCZDTB) |
| ratio of PCZDTB and PC71BM (for PC71BM) |
| value for series resistance at PCZDTB |
| value for series resistance at PC71BM (for PCZDTB) |
| value for series resistance at PC71BM (for PC71BM) |

The entities identified above are based on the precise words in the original paragraph. The ratios are identified as separate entities since they have different values for PCZDTB and PC71BM.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

The entities identified above are material properties, as they refer to specific properties of the PCZDTB and PC71BM materials. The numbers in the ratios are values associated with these properties.
